channel.title: Comments on: The Patch Of Endless Nerfs Cometh..

item.title: By: Teabag
item.dc:creator: Teabag
item.description:
Ahh more nerf-o-topia...
Let me know when TBC cometh... Oh wait it already out heh..
item.content:encoded:
Ahh more nerf-o-topia…

Let me know when TBC cometh… Oh wait it already out heh..

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: I was waiting for some Hunter nerfs to be thrown in there, but those must be in the next patch.
item.content:encoded: I was waiting for some Hunter nerfs to be thrown in there, but those must be in the next patch.

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description: Bah it filtered out some words there ... look like a spastic now :)
item.content:encoded: Bah it filtered out some words there … look like a spastic now ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description:
Hi my name is Ghiest, I play a rogue and ... I dont have improved sap .
Some good and some bad in that patch, I actually feel sorry for druids ... yes I know I shouldn't but I do. I just can't help it :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi my name is Ghiest, I play a rogue and … I dont have improved sap .

Some good and some bad in that patch, I actually feel sorry for druids … yes I know I shouldn’t but I do. I just can’t help it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mihn
item.dc:creator: Mihn
item.description:
Wee. No Rogue nerfs..
Of course, I just admitted I play a Rogue.
I'm so ashamed.
item.content:encoded:
Wee. No Rogue nerfs..

Of course, I just admitted I play a Rogue.
